Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: newspapers, language tapes, A3 and A4 photocopier, fax service, journals, magazines, DVDs and talking books. Community language materials available in Arabic, Slovak and Urdu. The library has a meeting room for hire. Children's activities include Baby Time. Provides 4 People's Network computers (1 with CD-Rom) with Microsoft Office and Internet access all available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon & Thurs closed, Tues 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-6pm, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); Tues, Wed, Fri & Sat at 3.15pm (Homework Zone), Tues 10-11am (Asian Women's Reading Group), 10-11am (coffee morning)
